document_data.caption: A map of Huzuz showing the Street of the Learned lined in black.
document_data.name: Street of the Learned
document_data.mainbody: The '''Street of the Learned''', or the '''University Road''', was located in [[Huzuz]], the City of Delights, in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Description: This street was so named because it provided the most direct route for students commuting to the ferries that crossed [[Al-Sarif River]] to the great university, [[Al-Bidir Sallah]]. The Street of the Learned was adjacent to the [[Street of the Ajami]] in the [[Craft District]], passing northeast though the district to exit the city and connect with the [[River Road]] and the ferries.
